name: Roo.util.CSS
desc: Utility class for manipulating CSS rules

methods.name: createStyleSheet
methods.desc:
Very simple dynamic creation of stylesheets from a text blob of rules.  The text will wrapped in a style
tag and appended to the HEAD of the document.

params.name: cssText
params.desc: The text containing the css rules

params.name: id
params.desc: An id to add to the stylesheet for later removal

methods.name: getRules
methods.desc: Gets all css rules for the document

params.name: refreshCache
params.desc: true to refresh the internal cache

methods.name: swapStyleSheet
methods.desc: Dynamically swaps an existing stylesheet reference for a new one

params.name: id
params.desc: The id of an existing link tag to remove

params.name: url
params.desc: The href of the new stylesheet to include

params.name: selector
params.desc: If it's an array it tries each selector until it finds one. Stops immediately once one is found.

params.name: value
params.desc: The new value for the property

methods.name: getRule
methods.desc: Gets an an individual CSS rule by selector(s)

params.name: selector
params.desc: The CSS selector or an array of selectors to try. The first selector that is found is returned.

params.name: refreshCache
params.desc: true to refresh the internal cache if you have recently updated any rules or added styles dynamically

methods.name: refreshCache
methods.desc: Refresh the rule cache if you have dynamically added stylesheets

methods.name: removeStyleSheet
methods.desc: Removes a style or link tag by id
